item.title: ðŸ‡¬ðŸ‡§ Vulnhub writeup : Bellatrix
item.description: LEVEL : Medium TIME SPEND : 1h10 LINK : Bellatrix NMAP Okay let’s start with the beginning ! sudo nmap -A -sS bellatrix.vuln As we can see, there are two main services : PORT Status Banner 22 OPEN OpenSSH 8.3p1 80 OPEN Apache http 2.4.46 Web Application The web application is using the http port 80. This page is a static html with a gif and a strange text with a .
